infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: WakeQuest uses the camera to capture new photos inside the app for your projects.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: WakeQuest uses the microphone to record audio tracks that the app attaches to your creations.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: WakeQuest uses your location to show nearby content and services while you use the app.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: WakeQuest uses motion data to run movement-based features you enable in the app.
